About Me

Software Engineer with twenty years of tech industry experience.

IBM Corporate Finance

Advisory IT Specialist

  • Delivered tools and processes that improved operational efficiency and replaced manual efforts with automated processes.
  • Participated in DB2 Data Warehouse and DataStage ETL projects, including: WorldWideSpend, an Enterprise planning solution for end-to-end spending and resource management; BaRT, a Business Intelligence data tool.

IBM Systems Group

IT Specialist

  • Created and maintained tools (i.e. STG Expense Pre-Approval tool) which simplifies and automates required expense pre-approval process.
  • Developed various ad-hoc tools to facilitate and automate various business projects (i.e. TBDM web survey development and support)

IBM Global Services

Lotus Notes Developer

  • Developed Lotus Notes Applications for External and Internal clients. Taking each project from requirements gathering through database design, testing, and deployment to on-going production support
